message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.ST

The paper deals with Thompson Sampling, a popular approach to bandit and reinforcement learning problems, and provides bounds on its regret for continuum armed bandits. This falls under the broad category of machine learning and optimization, which is covered by several arXiv CS sub-categories. Specifically, cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.IT (Information Theory) are likely categories as they cover topics related to bandit problems and reinforcement learning. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) and cs.ST (Statistics Theory) are also possible categories as they cover topics related to the analysis of algorithms and statistical methods, which are relevant to the paper's contributions.
